text: Brian Robert Thompson (July10, 1974December4, 2024) was an American businessman. He was the chief executive officer (CEO) of UnitedHealthcare from April 2021 until his assassination in December 2024. == Biography == Brian Robert Thompson was born in Ames, Iowa. He studied at the University of Iowa. Thompson became manager at PwC in 1997. He worked there until 2004, when he then moved to UnitedHealth Group. During his time as CEO of UnitedHealth Group, there was an increase in insurance claims getting rejected. In 2021 the American Hospital Association criticized Thompson for planning to deny insurance payment for non-critical visits to hospital emergency rooms. In May 2024, the Hollywood, Florida Firefighters' Pension Fund sued Thompson and two UnitedHealth Group executives for possible fraud and insider trading. == Assassination == On December 4, 2024 at night, Thompson was gunned down while walking outside his hotel in New York City. He was 50 years old.
